TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HtmlInputPassword extends System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText implements class System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler
type HtmlInputPassword = class inherit HtmlInputText interface IPostBackDataHandler

summary.span: 允许对服务器上的 HTML 元素进行编程访问。

span.span: Allows programmatic access to the HTML element on the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是从类派生的, 用于创建允许用户输入密码的单行文本框。The class is derived from the class and is used to create a single-line text box that allows the user to enter a password. 使用控件时, 每次提交窗体时, 都会将该属性发布到服务器。When using the control, the property is posted to the server each time the form is submitted. 控件的属性不会保留在视图状态中。The property for the control is not persisted in view state. 属性指定可在文本框中输入的最大字符数。The property specifies the maximum number of characters that can be entered in the text box. 属性允许您指定文本框的宽度。The property allows you to specify the width of the text box. 使用属性可确定用户在文本框中输入的值。Use the property to determine the value entered in the text box by the user. 控件提供了一个事件, 该事件在属性在向服务器的各次发送过程中的值更改时引发。 The control provides a event that is raised when the property changes values between posts to the server. 这允许您创建一个在每次引发事件时执行一组自定义指令的事件处理程序。This allows you to create an event handler that performs a custom set of instructions each time the event is raised. > [!NOTE] > 控件不提供回发到服务器的内置方式。The control does not provide a built-in way to post back to the server. 您必须在支持向服务器回发的网页 (如 或控件) 上提供另一个控件。You must provide another control on the Web page that supports posting back to the server, such as an or an control. 有关实例的初始属性值的列表, 请参见构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在 Web 窗``体``页上``以声明方式使用、和 HTML 控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the ``, ``, and `` HTML controls declaratively on a Web Forms page. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInput_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInput_1/CS/htmlinputcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInput_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInput_1/VB/htmlinputvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何在调用`Page_Load`方法的过程中以编程方式添加相同的 HTML 控件。The following code example demonstrates how to add the same HTML controls programmatically during a call to the `Page_Load` method. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInput_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInput_2/CS/htmlinput2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInput_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInput_2/VB/htmlinput2vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 使用默认值初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using default values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数创建并初始化使用默认值的控件的新实例。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the control using default values. 它将创建`password`一个类型文本框控件。It creates a `password` type text box control. 下表显示了实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||"Password" 文本字符串。The "password" literal string.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用默认构造函数以编程方式将、和控件添加到 Web 窗体页, 以创建简单的登录屏幕。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically add , , and controls to a Web Forms page using default constructors to create a simple login screen. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInput_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInput_2/CS/htmlinput2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInput_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInput_2/VB/htmlinput2vb.aspx#1)]

Protected Overrides Sub RenderAttributes (writer As HtmlTextWriter)

span.span: The that receives the rendered content.

summary.span: 将 控件的特性呈现给指定的 对象。

span.span: Renders the attributes of the control to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法从视图状态`Value`集合中删除该属性, 以防止它被呈现, 然后调用基类的方法。 The method removes the `Value` attribute from the view state collection to prevent it from being rendered, and then calls the base class's method.
